website_summaries.verdict: A versatile jacket with removable padding for motorcycle riding and everyday wear.
pros: Five sections of removable padding via Velcro pockets for maximum protection

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This jacket, I don't know if it saved my life but it certainly saved me a whole lot of pain and suffering. I was in a motorcycle accident recently. ended up flying through the air 60 feet away from point of impact. busted my knee. but the top half of my body went under touched. no broken bones, no road rash, no anything. 60 feet and not a scratch. this jacket worked a lot of magic that day. I am so very glad I bought this jacket and was wearing it. best investment of my life. will buy again in a heart beat, they did end up cutting it off after all. thank you for ever sold this to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Held me together.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, looks cool, but the main thing love about it is I totalled my busa. This thing saved my skin, elbows and shoulder from even hurting during my tumble in slide down the highway. I walked away with 3 small scratches and a couple light bruises largely due to this jacket. Aspault tested, rider approved.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: There’s better jackets out there for decent prices.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is stiff and not for me. It has the feel of a lower end leather jacket. I will only wear leather jackets with softer, more flexible leather, simply for the ability to move in case I need to react and operate my bike to avoid a collision. I returned this jacket and purchased a leather motorcycle jacket from 1st Manufacturing, an excellent company. A bit more, ($140.00) but still a great price for a soft pliable leather motorcycle jacket. I would not recommend the Men’s Blade jacket.
customer_reviews.author: PTAVETERAN

customer_reviews.title: OMG 12 Zippers and 34 Pads
customer_reviews.text: It feels like I'm wearing a 20# weighted vest, but according to my scale it's only about 6.5 lbs. Buying any type of clothing is a real crap shoot, so I'm so glad this XXL fits pretty well. You couldn't fit a Bic in those upper front zips, and I'm not sure about those pants zippers, but the 2 front and 2 inside pockets are very roomy, and the inside velcro pocket is pretty cool, too. With 12 front, 10 back, 2 shoulder, 4 side and 6 arm pads, you'll feel pretty safe, secure, and warm as toast in a cold wind. I can't wait to take it on a ride with Sporty.
customer_reviews.author: WVU Alumnus in Florida

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this.  Seller and amazon very helpful though
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality however theyre 2xl is actually a large. So if your normally and xl guy or girl you would need 3 or 4xl. The back of the collar sticks up into your neck, the jacket is very stiff especially the arms. I bought it cause it looked cool. But i dont think it would be comfortable for any biker. Especially you sport bike guys and girls. Seller says customer pays to return item. However amazon emailed me a slip, to print out and i didnt have to pay anything, when i dropped it at ups.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart237

customer_reviews.title: and not a fancy jacket for showing yourself with your nice, well-combed hair in your favorite pub on saturday ...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is NOT waterproof. I used it in a ride, a very heavy tropical storm came over, and I ended completely wet. The elbow and shoulder protection pads just don't stay in place and I will have to retrofit and use my engineering knowledge to make it work. The leather, however is coarse, it seems intended for the road and serious use, and not a fancy jacket for showing yourself with your nice, well-combed hair in your favorite pub on saturday night. But in hot weather (like here - over 27°C the entire year and humidity over 70%) it is not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: José

Anywhere. Makes it kinda useless on cold rides, the airflow through that full frontal zipper. It is what it is. It isn't for cool weather motorcycle riding. You might look cool though...

Fits fine, exchange was not needed.

customer_reviews.title: nicely built with great and smooth zippers
customer_reviews.text: There are pros and cons with this item. Pros, nicely built with great and smooth zippers. It came with removable armors that you slip in and out. The leather itself had the additional protection of being raised to provide cushion. It has reflectors on the pocket seams. Size is true to fit your regular measurements but will feel really fitted. Cons, it was very stiff and will need some conditioning and a break-in period. I returned mine for three main reasons: Right lower sleeve was already scratched up, the back looked melted/sticky, and the reflector on the right chest was already wearing away because of the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Geebot

customer_reviews.title: But I do love its look and it kept me warm riding into ...

After one year of riding, the inner windproof lining has started to rip at the seams by one of the shoulders too. The button on one of the sleeves also feel off immediately but its tucked into my riding gloves so that doesn't really matter. But I do love its look and it kept me warm riding into November of this year. Throw a sweatshirt on under it and I was riding in 41 degree F weather at highway speeds.

The jacket is not leather, but genuine fake leather.

product_meta.description:
Size:LargeFive section removable armor for back, shoulders and elbows. Armor is completely removable through inside armor pockets. Shoulder and elbow armor is made of injection molded plastic padded with foam. This provides superior protection compared to standard foam armor.
Made of Genuine 1.2mm Cow Hide Leather.
Strong zippers used all over.
Full sleeve zip out quilted liner for maximum comfort inside the jacket.
Two external hand pockets.
Jacket also features sleeve zippers.
Dual 360 and 8" Pant attachment zippers (Both male and female parts).
Foam around torso provides comfortable cushion between the rider and back seat rider.
Two ventilation zippers on chest area that can be opened up or closed for ventilation.

Removable quilted liner and strong YKK zippers.
Dual 360 and 8" Pant attachment zippers (Both male and female parts of the zipper).
